_header: Sapiens to man sayeth in his youth
_description: Advice from Sapiens for youth — one cross-rhymed quatrain

NottsULMeLm1.Transcription:
Sapiens to man sayth in hys yowtheTo travayle in trewthe tyme
                    hyt ysTo gete the ryches yff thou CoutheIn age to reste and lyue there
                    wyth
